item.title: JCS 8-8-14 Hour 3
item.description:

2. Baltimore fans cheer Ray Rice's return (cue it up..."What is wrong with people?")
3. The increased expectations for MLB position and pitching prospects
4. FSU has "SEC like " size on the line

item.title: JCS 8-8-14 Hour 1
item.description:
1. McIlroy dominating again
2. FSU Fan Day is this Sunday the 10th @ Doak Campbell Stadium
3. Marlins pitcher Dan Jennings takes a Jordy Mercer hit to the face
4. Would Tiger Woods pose for pics and autographs for fans at a gas station?.... Rory McIlroy did

4. Club level additions coming to Doak
